title: Set New Password
description: Enter your new password to complete the process.

error.title: Error
error.passwordRegexError: The password must be at least 8 characters long, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and a number.
error.invalidToken: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
error.text: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

success.title: Success
success.text: Your password has been reset successfully.

invalidCredentials.title: Invalid Credentials
invalidCredentials.text: The user does not exist or the link is incorrect.
